hadiths.text: Zirr b. Hubaish said that the heard that ‘ Ali was asked how the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to perform ablution. He then narrated the tradition and said:he wiped his head so much so that drops (of water) were about to trickle down. He then washed his feet three times and said: This is how the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) performed ablutions

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ وُضُوءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The Manner of The Prophet's Wudu'
